comments: I love his teaching style, he seems really flexible and reasonable. Wagner has a great sense of humor and truly knows and enjoys what he teaches. (I\'m taking him at Crafton, not Valley).
Awesome teacher. Suggest taking 090 before this because he does move quickly, but he is really easy to work with.

i had him for 090 and095 he is THE BEST his test are easy he goes over whats gna b on it. take him his class is stress free just do ur hw which isnt alot!!! u wont regret taking his class trust me an I HATE HATE HATE MATH he makes it soo easy to understand and if u dnt get it he will make sure u do. i wish he tought 102 \r take reid for 102 :)

Great Teacher! Took his Math 095 and really enjoyed it. I was never a lover of math, let only an enjoyer, but Mr. Wagner made the class fun. I only wish he taught some of the higher math classes!! Math 102 comes to mind!!

Took class spring 2010. Excellent teacher! He has a great attitude and personality that makes his class feel comfortable. Provides notes for u to print. Reviews what will be on tests. Easy going down to earth friendly guy who really helps U understand the math. I got A\'s on all my tests. By no means is his class an easy A. U do have to study.

i took him for both 090 and 095 OMG!! he is OOohhh so AaaWSOME! hes just great!. he made it easy to understand. i hate hate hate math but he made it really easy i didnt even have trouble learnin it and his test are easy as well i wish he tought 102

Wagner was the best math teacher I had. He made his own notes and examples for the students to understand better. He is always open to questions and shows you different ways how to do a problem. I highly recommend him.
he is very clear and understands what we want to know.

I took both his classes 090 and 095..I didn\'t like math before I took he class..I UNDERSTOODS things that I didn\'t get when I was in grade school but anyways take him he will help u understand...GREAT TEACHER
Great teacher, gives you the notes you just have to print them. Very understanding,and makes math easy to comprehend.
Keeps class interesting. Willing to help students. Likes when you participate, daily quizzes after review. Creates notes specifying the key points in lesson to teach off of.
